urls.title: Environment protest being criminalised around world, say experts
urls.description: More than 400 climate scientists sign letter that says activists are being targeted at pivotal time in fight against global heating

tweets.text:
'ENVIRONMENT PROTEST BEING CRIMINALISED AROUND WORLD'

‚ÄòDr Oscar Berglund ‚Ä¶ helped coordinate the letter. He said the attempt to ‚Äúcriminalise climate protest‚Äù was central to the fossil fuel industry‚Äôs new strategy of delaying action on climate change.‚Äô

https://t.co/tAfJ7k9cIH
@VerValleySoc @Chilternstreams Did you report it to the Agency?

It‚Äôs not all about building new #flood defences, a lot of work goes on to maintain the ones we already have. 

Today we have steel sheet piling being hammered in at #Torksey #Lincolnshire to strengthen the flood embankment. https://t.co/WwAHWFYg2o

@VerValleySoc @Chilternstreams Sadly, very similar on #Stevenage Brook today - at least 2 miles of milky white water, possibly where a cement lorry has been washed out. The @EnvAgency and @thameswater were both in attendance very fast. Did @Riverflies sample d/stream where clear & will rpt 2moro to see effects https://t.co/iVWz9JW5hx

@MattHancock @BorisJohnson @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 @PHE_uk what about the clean air human right bill ? No one should be forced to breathe dirty air ! The only air we have is poisoned with gas help us #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off

tweets.text:
Protect. Mark. Park.

Reduce the risk of criminals removing your #CatalyticConverter by following these simple steps. üëá 

We're encouraging people to report any suspicious activity to the police by calling 101, or 999 if an offence is in progress. üì± https://t.co/NIjzumqACh

People of Newcastle and Stoke, we should be worried. The 202 parts per cubic meter figure put out by @PHE_uk dwarfs these numbers from another landfill, but look at these peaks! @EnvAgency we need the data from the monitoring stations @ClareDinnisEA When do you call it dangerous? https://t.co/OAXO1TT6oF

Walley‚Äôs Quarry Landfill is the biggest issue facing @EnvAgency today in the UK. Our community are having to buy air purifiers just to sleep. Please sign the petition to help protect against landfills! #stopthestink https://t.co/2XW8dJUhKi https://t.co/rLdm0z74wW

Our pension fund is committing to reach net zero by 2045 and halve emissions by 2030 through the companies it invests in.

Read more on our blog: https://t.co/nLL7Tfvl5i #NetZero https://t.co/2GnsacICLx
And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/hW4PBXXY0Y
Did you know our Industrial Cleaning services include confined space entry?  Read how we ensure the health and safety of all personnel on the job here: https://t.co/gJE5BlnxuV https://t.co/Ap4KAa6xw2

This is Newcastle Under Lyme, a Town where the local peoplebsuffer and have to do the work of @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA #publichealthdisgrace https://t.co/5DXKjJvzHM

A question was asked of me from the #StopTheStink  community how the off-site hydrogen sulphide levels compared to other landfill sites recently monitored by the EA. Here are the results from my FOI request. Walley‚Äôs Quarry Landfill is on the bottom row. https://t.co/qRXBVkXVc8

It's nearly 9pm and I've accidently left a window open upstairs...just ran up to close it before the @RedIndustries2 gas hits us. @EnvAgency do you plan your life around being gassed by H2S? Asking for a friend... #stopthestink #landfill https://t.co/1ZkqqDuDCW

I have spent ¬£82 on a 2021 rod licence. I want the @EnvAgency to do far more to protect our rivers from pollution and leadership on the issue of riverine pollution from @JamesBevanEA. EA refusing to answer media questions because Prince Philip has died is not leadership.

urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.

tweets.text: So ended up in hospital after my headaches hit a level of extremity that I couldn't cope with at home. After a load of IV pain relief, anti-sickness and oxygen therapy I started feeling like a functioning human again. Apparently bad odours can trigger migranes/cluster attacks.

Environment Agency officers were out in #Bexley last week on a road stop with @MPSBexley. 40 vehicles were stopped, inc 12 vehicles carrying waste. One carrier was fined, while others were given advice or warnings. Make sure your waste carrier is licensed https://t.co/cFscOv0i4d https://t.co/29dS93PVbq
